edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.search

Class TokenHeapSearchManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.search.TokenSearchManager
      • edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.search.WordPruningBreadthFirstSearchManager
        • edu.cmu.sphinx.decoder.search.TokenHeapSearchManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchManager, Configurable

    public class TokenHeapSearchManager
extends WordPruningBreadthFirstSearchManager
    The token heap search manager that maintains the heap of best tokens for each search state instead of single one best token
